name: mdsquash
description: Merges multiple MD files into one readme

scripts.version: auto-changelog -l false --sort-commits date-desc --package --hide-credit --template changelog-template.hbs -p && ./index.js -i ExampleUse.md,CHANGELOG.md && git add -A CHANGELOG.md && git add -A README.md
scripts.postversion: git push &&  git push --tags && npm publish

author: Jt Whissel
